front.title: Compression in the Internet Key Exchange Protocol Version 2 (IKEv2)

abstract.t: This document describes a method for reducing the size of IKEv2 messages by means of lossless compression. Making IKEv2 messages smaller is desirable for low power consumption battery powered IoT devices. It also helps avoid IP fragmentation of IKEv2 messages. This document describes how compression is negotiated maintaining backward compatibility and how it is used in IKEv2.
